results.name: Alternating Jacobsthal triangle A_3(n,k) read by rows.
link: Kyu-Hwan Lee, Se-jin Oh, Catalan triangle numbers and binomial coefficients, arXiv:1601.06685 [math.CO], 2016.
mathematica: Table[A[n, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 12 2018 *)
xref: If initial column is omitted, this is very like the Riordan matrix A191582.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 07 2016
